title: StructureFinance
author: StructureFinance
content: Hello Community!You have already heard about the successful launch our unique product - Double-No-Touch (DNT) that pays double in BUSD when the price of BTC stays within a specified range over a 5-minute period.Today we are pleased to announce that next week we will be expanding DNT to include rewards in USDT!If youâ€™re just hearing about DNT, you can give it a try for as little as $1 at https://structure.finance/dnt/.To keep up to speed with our latest news, subscribe to our social networks:Telegram: https://t.me/StructureOfficialX: https://x.com/Structure_fin
